subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: The top-seeded Mardy Fish lost his first match at the Hall of Fame championships for the second straight year, falling to Rohan Bopanna, 7-6 (6), 7-5, on Wednesday. A No. 1 seed has not won the title in the event’s 32-year history on the Hall of Fame grass courts in Newport, R.I.
